content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
- Stone furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Stone furnace at position (65.0, -52.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. The error "No copper-ore to insert from your inventory" indicates that the agent attempted to insert copper ore when it was not available in the inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
